comments:
I encountered a reproduceable error on Eclipse 3.0 for AIX 5.3:

The error occurs when I try to create a new Plug-in Project - following the
steps in the Eclipse Acceptance Test under Test #7.1.2.1.5. The new project will
be created successfully but when I checked the Error Log, 4 errors were reported.

1. Missing required plug-in org.eclipse.perfmsr.core_null, null   org.exlipse.test
2. Widget is disposed   org.eclipse.ui
3. Unhandled event loop execution   org.eclipse.ui
4. Could not load library: libcore_2_1_0b.a This library provides
platform-specific optimizations for certain file systems operations. (it goes on
saying that it might not be available on all platforms and is not an error)

The Eclipse Acceptance Test was ran on the following Test environement:
AIX 5.30 Build 0414E_530
JRE 1.4.1 AIX BUild ca1411-20040301
Eclipse version 200405211200
Desktop environment VNC

The build you are using is quite old.  Many 'widgit is disposed' errors have 
been fixed.  
Problem #1 looks like a non-Platform plug-in and a typo - "eclipse" 
not "exlipse"
What is in your .log file?

Am passing to SWT to comment on #4.

For Comment #2: this was an Intro bug that was fixed a while back. 

closing defect.
